start.text: Hi, {0}, how may I serve you? ⚡️Powered by NekoGram⚡️

first_start.text: Hello {0}, I'm InPost, and I provide you the most convenient way to create posts with codes. ⚠️ Continue only if you agree to my terms of service. ⚡️Powered by NekoGram⚡️

banned.text: Sorry, you are banned from using me

menu_not_available.text: This section is in development yet

post_created.text: Your post has been created. You can share its code:

too_many_posts.text: You can't have more than 10 posts with same code, please choose something different

menu_faq.text: Here are the most frequently asked questions and other information related to me

menu_terms_of_service.text:
Objects of agreement: anyone who uses this bot (user), bot, developers.

All users who use the bot automatically agree with the terms of service described below.

Users and only users are responsible for the content they share using this bot.

Any inappropriate content will be deleted on demand.

Any user who breaks terms of this agreement may get banned from using the bot.

menu_create_post_step_1.text: Please send me text/photo/video/GIF, you can provide a caption (up to 1024 symbols), Telegram formatting is supported.

menu_create_post_step_2.text: Please send inline URI-keyboard map in format TEXT + URI or TEXT + URI # TEXT + URI (use # to have multiple buttons in a single row), use newlines to split rows. You can't have more than 5 buttons in a row and more than 20 rows

menu_create_post_step_3.text: Please send your preferred post code. It can be anything, even emoji. You will access your post using this code. For example: @In_Post_bot my awesome code Limit: 50 symbols.

menu_create_post_step_4.text: Your post has been created. You can share it:
